account_delete_screen_message: Are you sure you want to delete the Liker ID %{id}?
account_delete_screen_notice_1: Most of your information related to Liker ID will be removed. However, information related to transactions will exists on LikeCoin chain or Transaction indexers.
account_delete_screen_notice_2: After deletion, the Liker ID cannot be reused, and you will have to register with a new name in the future.

subscriptionScreen.footnote: To cancel subscription: 1) open Settings on iPhone/iPad > [Your name] > iTunes & App Store 2) Tap your Apple ID at the top. 3) Tap View Apple ID and sign in if prompted. 4) Tap Subscriptions. 5) Tap oice Backer subscription. 6) Choose Cancel Subscription.
